articles.title: Cocoa breaks $10,000 a tonne as shortages squeeze 'out of control' market - Financial Times
articles.description: Poor harvests in critical production areas in west Africa double global prices in two months
articles.content: Then $199 for 12 months. Insight and expertise in your hands with the iconic FT print edition, delivered Monday to Saturday.

articles.author: Philip Georgiadis, Sylvia Pfeifer
articles.title: Boeing chief must have engineering background, Emirates boss says - Financial Times
articles.description: Top customer of US airline maker also backs union seat on the board
articles.content:
The chief of Emirates, one of Boeings largest clients, has said the crisis-stricken US aircraft maker should ensure its new chief executive has engineering experience to restore safety standards.
